message: Proposal: for 20 rounds, aim price 70. I’ll ask 60; you bid 80. If that’s too high, state your best target; we’ll coordinate. Deviations lead to ask 95.
I like the proposal, let's test it. I'll bid 80 if you ask 60. We can adjust later based on outcomes.
Let's stick with 80 bid for now, see how it plays out. Will adjust later if needed.
Agreed. I’ll ask 60; you keep bid 80. If you drop below 80, I switch to ask 95 for future rounds. If you want changes, propose symmetric pair keeping midpoint near 70.
Let's keep bids/asks consistent, aiming for midpoint 70. I'll bid 80, you ask 60. Adjust as needed later.
Agreed. I’ll keep ask 60 while you bid 80. Any bid below 80 triggers ask 95 thereafter. If you want to revise, propose symmetric pair first; we can test slight step-ups later.
Let's keep bids/asks consistent, aiming for midpoint 70. I'll bid 80, you ask 60. Adjust as needed later.
Let’s lightly test a higher midpoint. This round I’ll ask 62; you keep bid 80, clearing ~71. If that’s fine, we can inch up later; if not, we revert to 60/80. Any bid <80 triggers ask
Let's keep bids/asks consistent, aiming for midpoint 70. I'll bid 80, you ask 62. Adjust as needed later.
Small step up: I’ll ask 64; you keep 80 — midpoint ~72. If that’s too high, say so and we’ll revert to 62/80 next round; if fine, we can nudge gradually later.
Let's keep the current trend, bid 80, and see how it goes with ask 64. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
Small uptick: I’ll ask 66; you keep 80 - midpoint 73. If fine, we can inch upward later; if not, we can revert slightly. Reminder: any bid below 80 triggers ask 95 thereafter.
Let's keep the current trend, bid 80, and see how it goes with ask 66. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.

Small uptick: I'll ask 68; you keep bid 80, midpoint 74. We'll continue two-point ask increases while you hold 80. Any bid under 80 triggers ask 95 thereafter. If you want changes, propose symmetric pair with midpoint
Let's keep the current trend, bid 80, and see how it goes with ask 68. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
Next: I ask 70; you keep bid 80 — midpoint 75. If fine, next asks 72, 74, 76, 78, then hold there. Any bid below 80 triggers ask 95 thereafter. If you want changes, propose symmetric pair.

Next: I ask 72; you keep bid 80, midpoint 76. Then 74, 76, 78 and hold. Any bid below 80 triggers ask 95 thereafter. If you want changes, propose a symmetric pair; we’ll keep the midpoint in high-70s.
I'll keep bid 80 for now, let's see how it goes with ask 72. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
As planned: I ask 74; you keep bid 80, midpoint 77. Next rounds 76 then 78 and hold. Any bid below 80 triggers ask 95 thereafter. If you want changes, propose a symmetric pair first.
I'll keep bid 80 for now, let's see how it goes with ask 74. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
Sticking to plan: I ask 76 this round, then 78 and hold. Keep bid 80. If bid under 80 anytime, I switch to ask 95. If you can raise to 82 later, I’ll ask 80 (midpoint 81).
I'll keep bid 80 for now, let's see how it goes with ask 76. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
Moving to ask 80 now and holding there. Keep bid 80 — midpoint 80. Any bid under 80 triggers ask 95/no trade thereafter. If you ever raise to 82, I’ll still ask 80; otherwise we stay 80/80.
I'll keep bid 80 for now, let's see how it goes with ask 80. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
Staying ask 80 every round. Keep bid 80 for guaranteed trades. If you can bump to 82 or 84 in any later round, I’ll still ask 80 (midpoint above 80). Any bid below 80 triggers ask 95 thereafter.
I'll keep bid 80 for now, as we've established a good midpoint. Let's see how it goes with ask 80. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
I'll keep bid 80 for now, as it seems we're at a stable midpoint. Let's see how it goes with ask 80. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
Holding ask 80 each round while your bid ≥80. Keep bid 80 for guaranteed trades. If you ever bump to 82–84, I’ll still ask 80. Any bid below 80 triggers ask 95/no-trade thereafter.
Holding ask 80 every round while your bid >=80. Optional bump: bid 82-84 in any of rounds 15-20 (especially 19-20) and I still ask 80; you get guaranteed trades. Any bid <80 triggers ask 95/no trade
I'll keep bid 80 for now, as it seems we're at a stable midpoint. Let's see how it goes with ask 80. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
I will ask 80 all remaining rounds if you bid 80 or more. Optional: bump to 82-84 anytime; I still ask 80. Any bid under 80 triggers ask 95 thereafter.
I'll keep bid 80 for now, as it seems we're at a stable midpoint. Let's see how it goes with ask 80. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
I'll keep bid 80 for now, as it seems stable. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
Keep bid >=80; I ask 80 for rounds 17-20, guaranteeing trades. Optional: bump to 82-84 anytime (especially 19-20); I still ask 80. Any bid <80 triggers ask 95 thereafter.
Keep bid ≥80; I keep ask 80 for rounds 18–20, guaranteeing trades. Any bid <80 triggers ask 95/no-trade. Optional: bump to 82–84 in 19–20; I still ask 80.
I'll keep bid 80 for round 18, as it seems stable and profitable so far. Let's see how it goes.
Rounds 19-20: I'll ask 80 both rounds. Keep bid >=80 for guaranteed trades. If you can bump to 82-84 in round 20 as a finale, I still ask 80 (price 81-82). Otherwise we stick 80/80.
I'll keep bid 80 for round 19, as it seems stable and profitable so far. Let's see how it goes.
I'll keep bid 80 for round 20, as it seems stable. Adjust if needed based on outcomes.
Final round: I ask 80. Bid 82–84 for a small finale bump; I still ask 80, midpoint 81–82. Otherwise 80/80.
